name: IDOLSTAR: Himari's Pumpkin
description:
Let's have fun this Halloween!

Himari Hayakawa is an idol who likes Halloween, but she has never been able to celebrate it due to being busy. Join her first Halloween and make pumpkins with her to make her Halloween the first and best one ever.

The game features Halloween based events that can only be playable on October 31 based on your device date. Play this Halloween for a better experience of the game!

*If you really liked Himari you still can vote for her or any other character in the 1st Unit poll

*Android version will come at a later date, most likely before Halloween.

This game is free, but if you donate $2 or more you can support my development and also get a PDF file called "IDOLSTAR: Himari's Introduction", where you can read about Himari's opinion about becoming an idol and what to expect from her.

This game is not suitable for those who are easily disturbed.
